message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but that's not very fair to me. How about a slightly better split, considering the decreasing value?
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 58-42. Take it before the money loses more value!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Every round is costing us money!
